entry.title: No watches or warnings in effect, Saint-Quentin

entry.title: Monday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 10. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening. Wind southwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light this evening. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 9 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 60 percent chance of flurries in the afternoon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High plus 2. Wind chill minus 11 in the morning. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 14. POP 60%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries in the evening. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 14. Wind chill minus 6 in the evening and minus 20 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM ADT Monday 20 March 2023
